page.description: Extracts EXIF info from an image file. Returns a .dot variable with these properties: .error (.t. or .f.), .errorText, .hasExifInfo, .latitude, .longitude, .date_time, .json (raw EXIF info in JSON format)

argument.name: result
argument.description: The result object that is returned has these properties

item.name: .error
item.description: .t. or .f. depending on if there was some error when trying to extract the EXIF information

item.name: .hasExifInfo
item.description: .t. or .f. depending on whether the image has EXIF information

item.name: .latitude
item.description: a character string with the latitude

item.name: .longitude
item.description: a character string with the longitude

item.name: .altitude
item.description: a character string with the altitude

item.name: .date_time
item.description: a character string with the date/time

item.name: .json
item.description: a character string with the all of the raw EXIF information in JSON format.
